Name: Pisco Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.9)
Ingredients: 25 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage.
Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish
Review: Pisco (and Peruvian bitters) add a distinctive south American touch to this summery drink. Ripe grape notes emerge and add to the drink's citrussy fruitiness.
History: Created in June 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. For more recipes and history see Fruit Cups and Pimm's .
Nutrition: One serving of Pisco Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.9) contains 197 calories
